Member Function Documentation

void SnpTable::open ( const char *  fileName  )  [inline]

Read in genotypes from a file that looks like probeset_id [tab] chip1 [tab] chip2 [tab]... chipN SNP_A-1889420 [tab] -1 [tab] 0 [tab] 2 [tab] ... 1

Entries are -1 = NN, 0 = AA, 1 = AB, 2 = BB

Parameters:
fileName - name of file to open.
